content2: 今日CS.CV 计算机视觉论文速览Thu, 2 May 2019Totally 22 papers👉上期速览✈更多精彩请移步主页Interesting:📚3DFaceGAN, 基于对抗网络的三维人脸表示、生成和迁移。利用GANs对3D人脸表面的分布进行建模，保持了3D外形的高频细节。(from 帝国理工)首先使用非刚体的表示，并将xyz顶点转到了UV空间中去，最后在UV空间中进行插值、实现三位重建。架构图：与现有的几种方法作比较：📚Learn to synthesize and synthesize to learn, 基于单模型的属性引导人脸生产，将输入人脸通过属性迁移到多个不同域中去。(from 洛桑理工)属性引导的面部图像合成以及位姿归一化模型：code:https://github.com/CreativePapers/Learn-to-Synthesize-and-Synthesize-to-Learn📚快速数据增强算法Fast AutoAugment, (from kakaobrain kr)code:https://github.com/kakaobrain/fast-autoaugmentweb:https://www.kakaobrain.com/📚基于神经网络检测干豆开裂比例, (from 密歇根州立)dataset:https://www.egr.msu.edu/drybeans/📚基于多层自编码器的图像修复, (from IIT Gandhinagar)模型中包含的不同组件：最后的结果，在缺失10%后依然可以有效恢复：![在这里插入图片描述](https://img-blog.csdnimg.cn/20190502213734721.png =600X)📚基于计算机视觉的动态恶意软件检测和解释, (from 因特尔，佐治亚理工)Daily Computer Vision Papers[1] Title: Pushing the Boundaries of View Extrapolation with Multiplane ImagesAuthors:Pratul P. Srinivasan, Richard Tucker, Jonathan T. Barron, Ravi Ramamoorthi, Ren Ng, Noah Snavely[2] Title: Learn Stereo, Infer Mono: Siamese Networks for Self-Supervised, Monocular, Depth EstimationAuthors:Matan Goldman, Tal Hassner, Shai Avidan[3] Title: Sex-Prediction from Periocular Images across Multiple Sensors and SpectraAuthors:Juan Tapia, Christian Rathgeb, Christoph Busch[4] Title: Estimation of Tissue Oxygen Saturation from RGB images and Sparse Hyperspectral Signals based on Conditional Generative Adversarial NetworkAuthors:Qingbiao Li, Jianyu Lin, Neil T.Clancy, Daniel S. Elson[5] Title: Gender Classification from Iris Texture Images Using a New Set of Binary Statistical Image FeaturesAuthors:Juan Tapia, Claudia Arellano[6] Title: Bean Split Ratio for Dry Bean Canning Quality and Variety AnalysisAuthors:Yunfei Long, Amber Bassett, Karen Cichy, Addie Thompson, Daniel Morris[7] Title: Towards computer vision powered color-nutrient assessment of pureed foodAuthors:Kaylen J. Pfisterer, Robert Amelard, Braeden Syrnyk, Alexander Wong[8] Title: 3DFaceGAN: Adversarial Nets for 3D Face Representation, Generation, and TranslationAuthors:Stylianos Moschoglou, Stylianos Ploumpis, Mihalis Nicolaou, Stefanos Zafeiriou[9] Title: AdaCos: Adaptively Scaling Cosine Logits for Effectively Learning Deep Face RepresentationsAuthors:Xiao Zhang, Rui Zhao, Yu Qiao, Xiaogang Wang, Hongsheng Li[10] Title: Learn to synthesize and synthesize to learnAuthors:Behzad Bozorgtabar, Mohammad Saeed Rad, Hazım Kemal Ekenel, Jean-Philippe Thiran[11] Title: Automatic Dataset Augmentation Using Virtual Human SimulationAuthors:Marcelo C. Ghilardi, Leandro Dihl, Estevão Testa, Pedro Braga, João P. Pianta, Isabel H. Manssour, Soraia R. Musse[12] Title: Unsupervised Temperature Scaling: Post-Processing Unsupervised Calibration of Deep Models DecisionsAuthors:Azadeh Sadat Mozafari, Hugo Siqueira Gomes, Wilson Leão, Christian Gagné[13] Title: Precise Synthetic Image and LiDAR (PreSIL) Dataset for Autonomous Vehicle PerceptionAuthors:Braden Hurl, Krzysztof Czarnecki, Steven Waslander[14] Title: Self-Supervised Convolutional Subspace Clustering NetworkAuthors:Junjian Zhang, Chun-Guang Li, Chong You, Xianbiao Qi, Honggang Zhang, Jun Guo, Zhouchen Lin[15] Title: Harmonic Networks with Limited Training SamplesAuthors:Matej Ulicny, Vladimir A. Krylov, Rozenn Dahyot[16] Title: Predicting How to Distribute Work Between Algorithms and Humans to Segment an Image BatchAuthors:Danna Gurari, Yinan Zhao, Suyog Dutt Jain, Margrit Betke, Kristen Grauman[17] Title: Attentive Spatio-Temporal Representation Learning for Diving ClassificationAuthors:Gagan Kanojia, Sudhakar Kumawat, Shanmuganathan Raman[18] Title: Appearance and Pose-Conditioned Human Image Generation using Deformable GANsAuthors:Aliaksandr Siarohin, Stéphane Lathuilière, Enver Sangineto, Nicu Sebe[19] Title: Cross Domain Knowledge Learning with Dual-branch Adversarial Network for Vehicle Re-identificationAuthors:Jinjia Peng, Huibing Wang, Xianping Fu[20] Title: Fast AutoAugmentAuthors:Sungbin Lim, Ildoo Kim, Taesup Kim, Chiheon Kim, Sungwoong Kim[21] Title: Multi-level Encoder-Decoder Architectures for Image RestorationAuthors:Indra Deep Mastan, Shanmuganathan Raman[22] Title: To believe or not to believe: Validating explanation fidelity for dynamic malware analysisAuthors:Li Chen, Carter Yagemann, Evan DowningPapers from arxiv.org更多精彩请移步主页pic from pixels.com
